Title: The Foundation of Criminal Excellence
Actors: Lauris Klavins, Andris Daugavins, Maris Micerevskis, Armands Brakmanis
Plot: Imants Veide is writing a script about con artists and their schemes. Together with his friend Harijs Kuharjonoks he's trying them out for real for greater authenticity, but gets too entangled in real criminal schemes.
